scripts.build: yarn buildBuilder && yarn workspaces foreach --topological-dev --no-private run g:echo | cat > topologicalDeps.txt && yarn workspace @tinacms/scripts build:all
scripts.g:nuke: cd $INIT_CWD && yarn exec rm -rf dist && echo "cleaned"
scripts.version: yarn changeset version --ignore tina-cloud-starter --ignore tina-tailwind-sidebar-demo --ignore starter-basic
scripts.version:snapshot: yarn changeset version --snapshot --ignore tina-cloud-starter --ignore tina-tailwind-sidebar-demo --ignore starter-basic
scripts.publish: yarn workspaces foreach --no-private --verbose npm publish --tolerate-republish --access public
scripts.publish:dev: yarn workspaces foreach --no-private --verbose npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag dev --access public
scripts.publish:beta: yarn workspaces foreach --no-private --verbose npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag beta --access public
scripts.swapDeps: yarn workspaces foreach --include tina-cloud-starter --include tina-tailwind-sidebar-demo --include starter-basic run g:swap
